name: Infermon
effect: Your [Keramon] can digivolve into this card in your hand for a memory cost of 4, ignoring this card's digivolution requirements.
digivolve_effect: [On Deletion] You may play 1 [Diaboromon] Token without paying its memory cost. (Diaboromon Tokens are level 6 white Digimon with a memory cost of 14, 3000 DP, and are Mega form, Unidentified type, and Unknown attribute.)
